com.callcontrol.datashare

Class CallControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.callcontrol.datashare.CallControl

  • public final class CallControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Call Control application integration contract class.

    Provides constants for use with ContentResolver as well as a set of handy methods to simplify routine operations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Contract class for Lookup results.

      Reported number.

      • openBlockedList

        public static boolean openBlockedList(android.content.Context context)
        Opens Blocked List in Call Control.
        Parameters:
        context - Context where Context.startActivity(Intent) will be executed.
        Returns:
        True if the intent has been sent, false on error.

      • openBlockedList

        public static boolean openBlockedList(android.content.Context context,
                                      java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Opens specified number in Blocked List in Call Control if possible.

        If the number is null, the behavior is identical to openBlockedList(Context).

        Parameters:
        context - Context where Context.startActivity(Intent) will be executed.
        phoneNumber - Phone number to present.
        Returns:
        True if the intent has been sent, false on error.

      • lookupNumber

        public static boolean lookupNumber(android.content.Context context,
                                   java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Performs a number lookup in Call Control UI.
        Parameters:
        context - Context where Context.startActivity(Intent) will be executed.
        phoneNumber - Phone number to lookup.
        Returns:
        True if the intent has been sent, false on error.

      • report

        public static boolean report(android.content.Context context,
                             CallControl.Report report)
        Reports a number via Call Control UI.

        Will present Call Control UI which interacts with user.

        After user confirms the report, he is asked if he wants to also add the number to Blocked List.

        Parameters:
        context - Context where Context.startActivity(Intent) will be executed.
        report - Report about a number.
        Returns:
        True if the intent has been sent, false on error.

      • report

        public static boolean report(android.content.Context context,
                             java.util.ArrayList<CallControl.Report> reports)

        Reports a set of numbers via Call Control UI.

        Will present Call Control UI which interacts with user.

        After user confirms the report, the number is also added to Blocked List.

        IMPORTANT: Must contain the list with ALL items having the same value of the CallControl.Report.isUnwanted flag. I.e. in one run you only report either unwanted or wanted numbers, but you cannot mix them in one call.

        Safe to execute with empty list, does nothing in this case.

        Useful when user enables the integration and the application wants to put already known blocked numbers to Call Control in one run.

        Parameters:
        context - Context where Context.startActivity(Intent) will be executed.
        reports - List of numbers to report. Must all have identical CallControl.Report.isUnwanted flag.
        Returns:
        True if the intent has been sent, false on error.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When CallControl.Report.isUnwanted is not the same for all numbers.

      • openAccessSettings

        public static boolean openAccessSettings(android.content.Context context)
        Opens access settings for 3rd party apps within Call Control UI.
        Parameters:
        context - Context where Context.startActivity(Intent) will be executed.
        Returns:
        True if the intent has been sent, false on error.
